tags.name: Addresses
tags.description:
REST API which manages Address.
User's address. User can have several addresses (e.g. invoice/delivery/physical).

tags.name: Auth Data
tags.description:
REST API which manages AuthData.
AuthData contains all user auth-related information regarding passwords, login properties, etc.
Auth data object is created together with User object.

tags.name: Calendar Ranges
tags.description:
REST API which manages CalendarRange.
Calendar ranges. Calendars represent user personal vacation calendar or company calendars.

tags.name: Company Calendars
tags.description:
REST API which manages CompanyCalendar.
Company calendars represents company vacation days.

tags.name: Distribution Lists
tags.description:
REST API which manages DistributionList.
Distribution list is a list of email recipients.

tags.name: Group Memberships
tags.description:
REST API which manages GroupMembership.
Represents User's membeship in the Group.
One user can be a part of many Groups.

tags.name: Group-Role-Sso Assignments
tags.description:
REST API which manages GroupRoleSsoAssignment.
SSO mapping for GroupRole pair.

tags.name: Group-Role-User Assignments
tags.description:
REST API which manages GroupRoleUserAssignment.
User - Group - Role mapping.
Used for permissions management on the Group level.

tags.name: Groups
tags.description:
REST API which manages Group.
User group. One user can be a part of many groups.

tags.name: Labels
tags.description:
REST API which manages Label.
User's labels - unique strings which can be assigned to a user.

tags.name: Login Requests
tags.description:
REST API which manages LoginRequest.
Contains all Login Request information for a user.

tags.name: Old Passwords
tags.description:
REST API which manages OldPassword.
User's old passwords hash.

tags.name: Organizational Unit
tags.description:
REST API which manages OrgUnit.
Organizational unit. One user must be a part of one organizational unit.

tags.name: Permissions
tags.description:
REST API which manages Permission.
If user has a permission, then he has access to a specific functionality.
User can obtain a permission if he has a role which contains the permission.

tags.name: Personal Data
tags.description:
REST API which manages PersonalData.
Personal data contains user's personal data like phone, fax, etc.
Personal data object is created together with User object.

tags.name: Roles
tags.description:
REST API which manages Role.
Role contains a set of permissions.
User can have one role for each role type.

tags.name: Sso Groups
tags.description:
REST API which manages SsoGroup.
SSO group is used for assigning roles and data to user during SSO authentication.

tags.name: Substitutes
tags.description:
REST API which manages Substitute.
Substitute of the user.
E.g. when delegator goes to vacation he can select several substitutes per type/group.

tags.name: Substitution Configurations
tags.description:
REST API which manages SubstitutionConfiguration.
Substitution configuration of a user.
E.g. when user goes to vacation he configures substitution settings and sets his substitution.

tags.name: User Calendars
tags.description:
REST API which manages UserCalendar.
User calendars represents user personal vacation calendar.

tags.name: User Data Types
tags.description:
REST API which manages UserDataType.
User generic data contains data which can be registered separately.
Any service can register it's user fields, so they can be stored in User service.
Usually service-specific data is stored here.

tags.name: User Data Values
tags.description:
REST API which manages UserDataValue.
User generic data contains data which can be registered separately.
Any service can register it's user fields, so they can be stored in User service.
Usually service-specific data is stored here.

tags.name: User Preferences
tags.description:
REST API which manages UserPreference.
Personal preferences for a user like language, timezone, etc.
User preferences object is created together with User object.

tags.name: Users
tags.description:
REST API which manages User.
User contains basic user fields and user's relations.

tags.name: Virtual Database Groups
tags.description:
REST API which manages VirtualDbGroup.
Contains a list of virtual databases.
One user can have only one virtual database group.

tags.name: Virtual Databases
tags.description:
REST API which manages VirtualDb.
Virtual database. Can be used for grouping data e.g. in Media Pool.
Virtual database is assigned to user via the Virtual database groups.

tags.name: Working Hours
tags.description:
REST API which manages WorkingHours.
User's working hours for each day of a week.
Used for resource management.

parameters.name: createdAtFrom
parameters.description: Start datetime to search by Address's createdAt (>= createdAt).

parameters.name: createdAtTo
parameters.description: End datetime to search by Address's createdAt (<= createdAt).

parameters.name: orderBy
parameters.description:
Search order by - results will be sorted by specified fields.
Default sorting is by creation date.

parameters.name: updatedAtFrom
parameters.description: Start datetime to search by Address's updatedAt (>= updatedAt).

parameters.name: updatedAtTo
parameters.description: End datetime to search by Address's updatedAt (<= updatedAt).

parameters.name: withTotal
parameters.description:
if true - search returns total amount of records.
set false for better performance, when you don't need total amount.

207.description: Multistatus with success and error result
Multistatus with success and error result

get.description: Returns merged user ranges and all applied company calendars with their ranges.

Returns merged CalendarRange's for users. Both User calendars and Company calendars are considered
with all selections and filtration. The end result is the ranges when user is not working for any reason.

Example: 
 {@code
 {
 "message": "Role not found",
 "parameters": "[message_parameter1, message_parameter2, ...]",
 "details": "You pass ",
 "objectType": "RoleEntity",
 "objectId": "12345",     // key for income parameter Map
 "objectIndex": "12345",  // position for income parameter List
 "location": "",//path or field
 "incorrectValue": "11",
 }
 }

 {@code

 "title": "Object not found",

 "traceId": "e017ecb2-d72f-4f79-889f-6c42126970a8", //id in log file

 "errors": [
 {
 "message": "Role not found",
 "detail": "You pass ",
 "objectType": "RoleEntity",
 "incorrectValue": "11",

 }
 ]
 }
 }
